# error

**Instance Property**

The error that caused the renderer to no longer render sample buffers.

## Declaration

```swift
var error: (any Error)? { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is nil unless the value of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVSampleBufferAudioRenderer/status] is [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVQueuedSampleBufferRenderingStatus/failed].
title: error
